mapper.insert: insert into raffleDetail (rno, mid, rdtcreatedat, rdtmissioncleared, rdtberryspend) values (#{rno}, #{mid}, systimestamp, 'PEND', 0)
mapper.select: select r.rno as "raffle.rno", r.rtitle as "raffle.rtitle", rdt.rno as "raffleDetail.rno", rdt.mid as "raffleDetail.mid", rdt.rdtcreatedat as "raffleDetail.rdtcreatedat", rdt.rdtmissioncleared as "raffleDetail.rdtmissioncleared", rdt.rdtberryspend as "raffleDetail.rdtberryspend" from raffle r INNER JOIN raffleDetail rdt ON r.rno = rdt.rno where rdt.mid = #{mid} AND rdt.rdtcreatedat between #{startdate} AND #{enddate}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM raffleDetail rd INNER JOIN raffle r ON rd.rno = r.rno WHERE r.rstartedat <= systimestamp AND systimestamp <= r.rfinishedat
AND rd.mid = #{mid}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM raffleDetail rd INNER JOIN raffle r ON rd.rno = r.rno WHERE r.rfinishedat < systimestamp
AND rd.mid = #{mid}

select r.rno "raffle.rno", r.rtitle "raffle.rtitle", r.rstartedat "raffle.rstartedat", r.rfinishedat "raffle.rfinishedat", rd.rdtcreatedat "raffleDetail.rdtcreatedat", rd.rdtmissioncleared "raffleDetail.rdtmissioncleared", rd.rdtberryspend "raffleDetail.rdtberryspend" from raffleDetail rd INNER JOIN raffle r ON rd.rno = r.rno where mid = #{mid}

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM raffleDetail WHERE rno = #{rno}) AS totalEntry, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM raffleDetail WHERE rno = #{rno} AND rdtmissioncleared = 'PASS') AS missionCleared, ( SELECT SUM(rdtberryspend) FROM raffleDetail WHERE rno = #{rno}) AS berrySpend FROM dual
select count(*) from raffleDetail where mid = #{mid} AND TRUNC(rdtcreatedat) = TRUNC(sysdate)
select count(*) from raffleDetail where mid = #{mid} AND TRUNC(rdtcreatedat) = TRUNC(sysdate) AND rdtmissioncleared = 'PASS'
